item.title: I-580 North - Exit 24
item.description: I-580/US-395 North at Exit 24 - NV-431/Mount Rose Highway. Continue north on I-580/US-395 for Reno.

item.title: I-580 North - Exit 24
item.description: I-580/US-395 North approaching Exit 24 - NV-431/Mount Rose Highway.

item.title: I-580 North Approaching Exit 24
item.description: I-580/US-395 North approaching Exit 24. Use Exit 24 for Virginia City.

item.title: I-580 North Approaching Exit 24
item.description: I-580 North approaching Exit 2. Use Exit 24 for N. Lake Tahoe and Virginia City

item.title: NV-431 East at US-395
item.description: NV-431 east at I-580/US-395. For I-580/US-395 north to Reno continue straight. Merge right for I-580/US-395 south to Carson City and South Lake Tahoe.

item.title: NV-431 East at I-580/US-395 South Freeway Entrance
item.description: NV-431 East at I-580/US-395 South Freeway Entrance.

item.title: NV-431 East at I-580/US-395 South
item.description: NV-431 East at I-580/US-395 South to South Lake Tahoe and Carson City.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exit 56 Offramp
item.description: I-580/US-395 North on Exit 56 Offramp. Turn right for NV-431 East (via NV-341) to Virginia City. Turn left for NV-431 West to North Lake Tahoe.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exit 56
item.description: I-580/US-395 North at Exit 56 - NV-431/Mount Rose Highway. Continue north on I-580/US-395 for Reno.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - N. Lake Tahoe/Virginia City
item.description: I-580/US-395 North - Use Exit 56 for N. Lake Tahoe and Virginia City (via NV-341).

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exit 56
item.description: I-580/US-395 North approaching Exit 56 - NV-431/Mount Rose Highway.

item.title: NV-431 East at US-395
item.description: NV-431 east at US-395. This is the southern end of the current US-395 freeway. The section between NV-431 and Washoe Lake is expected to be completed in late 2012. For US-395 north to Reno continue straight. In late 2012, the right lanes will be for US-395 south to Carson City and South Lake Tahoe.

item.title: NV-431 East - Mount Rose Summit
item.description: NV-431 East at Mount Rose Summit - Elevation 8900 Feet. Mount Rose Summit is one of the few Sierra Nevada passes in Nevada, and is the highest pass open year round in the Sierra Nevada.

item.title: End NV-431 West at NV-28
item.description: End NV-431 West at NV-28 in Incline Village.

item.title: NV-28 East at NV-431
item.description: NV-28 east at NV-431 in Incline Village.

item.title: NV-28 East Approaching NV-431
item.description: NV-28 east approaching NV-431. Use NV-431 for Reno (the Mount Rose Highway); continue east on NV-28 for Sierra Nevada College.

item.title: NV-28 East Approaching NV-431
item.description: NV-28 east approaching NV-431 (Mount Rose Highway).
